emuInput.TitMainTitle: Children, including Cub Scouts and Brownies, posing on grandstand with television personalities Lolo and Marty Wolfson, with sign for TV Safety Rangers, at WTAE studio
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 5, 1959, pg. A3, reads: "Pitch for Safety - The above youngsters participated in weekly safety program telecast by Station WTAE Saturday morning at 10 o'clock. The safety telecasts are a regular part of WTAE's programs.  The youngsters from Hill City, pictured above, are Charles Pollard, Richard Morton, Reginald Charley, Ishmael Johnson, Edward Swoupe, Gregory Royster, Israel McCoy, Jr., Fred Grant, Arthur Stanley, Roland Slade, Barry Slade, Gary Carter, William Boyce, Dana Turnipseed, Chester Johnson, Paul Sheard, Curtis Upshur, John Johnson, Tommy Royster, Calvin Mixon, Wilfred Mixon, John Everette, Matthew McMillan, Donna Jean Anderson, Charles Anderson, Wayne Anderson, Rose Marie Long, Carolyn Long, Eugene Long, Tyrone Scott, William Scott, John Trent, Denise Washington, Karen Washington, Patricia Washington, Herkie Johnson, Judy Hilliard, Lonnie Brooks, James Jackson, Carolyn Morton, Donalda Allen, and Darryl Allen. - Harris Photo."
